title: Android Flavor Configuration
description: Configure Android build.gradle for three flavors with different app IDs.
instructions: Write the productFlavors block for build.gradle that creates dev, staging, and prod flavors. Each should have: appropriate applicationIdSuffix (except prod), versionNameSuffix, and app_name resource value.

hints.text: flavorDimensions must be declared before productFlavors
Each flavor needs 'dimension' set to match the flavorDimensions value
Use resValue to create string resources that can be referenced in AndroidManifest.xml

commonMistakes.mistake: Forgetting to set dimension for each flavor
commonMistakes.consequence: Build fails with 'All flavors must have a value for dimension' error
Completely replaces the app ID instead of appending to it
commonMistakes.correction: Use applicationIdSuffix to append '.dev' or '.staging' to the base ID
